decks.notes: This deck focuses on casting spells without needing lands, utilizing powerful combo pieces like Hydroelectric Specimen and Thundertrap Trainer to generate mana and draw cards, while also including control elements such as Suppression Ray and Pact of Negation to protect the combo. The goal is to assemble the necessary pieces quickly and efficiently, using cards like Flare of Denial and Commandeer to disrupt the opponent's strategy and win the game with explosive plays like Goblin Charbelcher. Whir of Invention helps tutor for key artifacts, while Sea Gate Restoration and Beyeen Veil provide additional card advantage.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize the Dredge mechanic to quickly fill the graveyard with cards like Golgari Thug and Stinkweed Imp, while also using cards like Narcomoeba and Prized Amalgam to return from the graveyard to the battlefield. Combined with cards like Creeping Chill for additional damage and Cathartic Reunion for card draw, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a powerful graveyard recursion engine. The addition of Ox of Agonas and Silversmote Ghoul provide additional graveyard interaction and potential for explosive plays.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly outpace your opponent and deal as much damage as possible. It also includes Leylines to protect your creatures and disrupt your opponent's plan. The inclusion of Jegantha as a Companion gives you access to more mana and allows you to keep up the pressure on your opponent. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm your opponent with fast, efficient threats and close out the game before they have a chance to stabilize.

The main principle of this deck is to quickly generate mana through rituals and medallions to cast a large number of spells in a single turn, utilizing Past in Flames to recast them from the graveyard. By chaining spells together, the deck aims to generate a large storm count to finish off the opponent with a lethal Grapeshot or Ral, Monsoon Mage's ultimate ability. The deck also includes cards like Wish and Valakut Awakening to tutor for specific cards or shuffle the deck in case of unfavorable draws.
